SELECT b.BATTLE_ID AS battleId, b.CHARACTER_ID AS characterId, b.BATTLE_TYPE AS battleType, b.OPPONENT_ID AS opponentId, b.IS_WIN AS isWin, b.TURN_COUNT AS turnCount, b.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, b.CREATED_BY AS createdBy, b.UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate, b.UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, COALESCE(c.CHARACTER_NAME, '삭제된 캐릭터') AS characterName, CASE WHEN b.BATTLE_TYPE = 'PVP' THEN COALESCE(oc.CHARACTER_NAME, '삭제된 캐릭터') WHEN b.BATTLE_TYPE = 'PVE' THEN COALESCE(m.MONSTER_NAME, '삭제된 몬스터') ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS opponentName
FROM TB_BATTLE_LOG b LEFT JOIN TB_CHARACTER c ON b.CHARACTER_ID = c.CHARACTER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CHARACTER oc ON b.OPPONENT_ID = oc.CHARACTER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MONSTER m ON b.OPPONENT_ID = m.MONSTER_ID
WHERE b.CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId} OR b.OPPONENT_ID = #{characterId}
ORDER BY b.CREATED_DATE DESC
